EmailTemplate.subject: Win 2 Tix to VMworld Europe | Final Drawing Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Enter For Your Chance to Win 2 Passes to VMworld Europe Drawings on August 22, August 29, & September 9 Enter to Win 2 Full Passes to VMworld® Europe! <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps&utm_content=090414> Every Friday in June, we gave away two full conference passes to VMworld® U.S. Tomorrow marks the third and final drawing of our VMworld Europe Sweepstakes. Enter today <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps&utm_content=090414>, and see you in Barca. Please see Official Rules <http://go.vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes-rules.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps&utm_content=090414>. We have included as many countries as legally possible because we love you. Enter to Win <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps&utm_content=090414> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
